item.title: Steganography for beginners üîè
item.description: Steganography is the technique of hiding secret data within an ordinary, non-secret, file or message in order to avoid detection; the secret data is then extracted at its destination. … The word steganography is derived from the Greek words steganos (meaning hidden or covered) and the Greek root graph (meaning to write) - Wikipedia. In this post, we are going to describe solutions to the KRACK-JIIT CTF 2019 Organized by JIIT Open Dev Circle (jodc).
